Package Bed_And_Breakfast

Class Customer

java.lang.Object
Bed_And_Breakfast.User
Bed_And_Breakfast.Customer
Direct Known Subclasses:
Gold, Standard
public abstract class Customer extends User
abstract class which will extend User class it will maintain the bookings arraylist for each customer.
Version:
17.0.8
Author:
Raed Alseikh Amin
